thread.title: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell publicly confess their love for each other on social media
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell publicly confess their love for each other on social media

author: Vicki Newman
title: Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell publicly confess their love for each other on social media
text:
Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell publicly confess their love for each other on social media The reality stars sent 'I love you' messages on Twitter Share Jeremy McConnell and Stephanie Davis shared very public I love yous (Photo: @JezzaMcConnell/Twitter) Share Get celebs   Could   
On-off couple Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell have publicly confessed their love for each other. 
Shortly after changing his Twitter profile picture to one of him cuddling into Steph and their baby boy Caben-Albi, Jeremy sent out a public declaration of love. 
The Irish model posted a message to the former Hollyoaks actress on the social media site, saying: "@Stephdavis77 I love you [middle finger] everyone else]". 
Steph soon replied, telling Jeremy: "I love you too". 
She posted a pair of memes along with it. Read More Are they back together? (Photo: Rex/Shutterstock) Jeremy updated his profile picture with this snap earlier (Photo: Twitter) 
One read: "Love is a meeting of two souls, fully accepting the dark and the light of each other, bound by the courage to grow through struggle into bliss." 
The other said: "All relationships go through hell, real relationships get through it." 
Steph and Jez have had quite a tumultuous relationship. 
They met during their time in the Celebrity Big Brother house last year and started dating. 
They broke up a few months later, and then Steph found out she was pregnant. Jeremy told Steph he loved her (Photo: @JezzaMcConnell/Twitter) She said it back (Photo: @JezzaMcConnell/Twitter) She also shared memes about love (Photo: @JezzaMcConnell/Twitter) And another... (Photo: @JezzaMcConnell/Twitter) Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jeremy McConnell uploads adorable video of him and baby Caben Share this video Watch Next 
Jez denied the baby was is, saying that Steph had cheated on him, and demanded a paternity test.Little Caben was born on January 13, and soon after that, Jeremy posted on Instagram, acknowledging him as his son. 
But since then, things have still been on and off between the new parents. 
Jeremy was recently arrested in relation to an alleged assault against Steph. 
The star was arrested earlier this month on suspicion of assaulting Stephanie and causing criminal damage to her home. 
The 27-year-old, who has denied any wrongdoing, was released later that day pending a disposal decision. 
Police are continuing their enquiries into the alleged incident. Read More They met on CBB (Photo: Channel 5) They have a son, Caben-Albi together (Photo: jeremymcconnellcooke/Instagram) 
A statement said: “The 27-year-old man arrested earlier today on suspicion of assault and criminal damage has been released pending a disposal decision.” 
Jeremy had voluntarily attended the Merseyside police station earlier in the day to assist police with their enquiries. 
An earlier statement from the force said: "Following a report of an assault at an address in Rainhill, a man has been arrested. 
"A 27-year-old man from Liverpool city centre has been arrested on suspicion of assault and criminal damage after voluntarily attending a police station on Merseyside. He remains in police custody for questioning." 
A rep for Jeremy told Mirror Online: “Jeremy denies any wrongdoing, however he is fully cooperating with the police in their investigations." 
Mirror Online has contacted Steph and Jeremy's representatives for comment on their relationship status. Like us on Facebook
